descriptionlist.description:
iOS 13 now has a dark mode, but leaves a lot to be desired.
Noctis Neo is custom-built from the ground up to complement the standard dark mode perfectly.
The tweak includes: • Preset dark color theme modes such as "True Dark" for OLED devices. • Ready-made themes in blur mode (coming soon). • Customizable responsive color for notifications, widgets and 3D Touch menus. • Customizable dark color mode from normal to full black. • Light mode for notifications, widgets, folders or dock menu. • Includes iOS 10 style widget titles. • Dark web pages that support most browsers such as Safari and Chrome. • Enable blur mode for 3D Touch menu. • Dark Control Center (coming soon). • Turn on tweak along with the standard dark mode of the system. • Adaptive mode has two settings, light and dark, corresponding to the current state of dark mode. .
